ee bawa syamopa sampadawathehi 39 wana pitehi sandahan wana ayurin ‘ hama dena wahansema sima malakaya madata pamina athpasa nowihida palamu paridden ranpotha balagena sammatha karmawakya nohoth buddha karmawakya deka kiya samaptha kala kalhi eya asu lankeshwara pramukha rajaraja mahamathyadin athuluwa dahas ganan senawa ahasapolawa deka gugurannak men ekapahara sadhukara dunha.me ayurin kirthi shri rajasinha rajathuma apamana sathutata pathwa kusala rashi wardhanaya kala aakaraya sandahan we.upasampadawa pihituwimata pohoya simawak athyawashya wu heyin eda mihindu ma himiyan dewanampiyathissa rajathumage anugrahaya labagena pohoya simawak sammatha kalak menma upali mahimiyan da kirthi shri rajasinha maha rajathumage anugrahaya labagena sammatha karana lada uposhithagarayehi ada dakwama wasara 260k mulullehi maha wiharawanshika syamanikayika bhikshunwahansege upasampadawa sidu karalamin bhikshunwahanse sahitha rajaraja mahamathyadi sadahawathunge nomada gaurawayata pathrawa pawathi.
